subject: College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Politicians and other critics are calling for more firings at seemingly dysfunctional Rutgers University, but William C. Rhoden says it’s time for everyone to take a deep breath.
snippet: Politicians and other critics are calling for more firings at seemingly dysfunctional Rutgers University, but William C. Rhoden says it’s time for everyone to take a deep breath.
